name: Linked (itch) (Zuriel Joven)
description:
Use A/D or arrow keys and spacebar to play.

Explore the consequences of the past in this unique storytelling experience! Realize the eventful night of Black, Blue, Red, Green, Blacky and Orange in this short game.

Content warning: contains references to explicit content including sex, violence, drugs, and alcohol.

For Weekly Game Jam 170: Chain Reaction.

P. S. There are some visual glitches. Sorry about that.
